trends: There have been no other sightings in concho
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: (gs) let dogs out about 3am and saw two lights in distance got camera took video with camera stand had seen it a week earlier and i wanted to be ready if they showed up again
divs: sighting detailsi was awakened by the dogs, it was about 330am and i let them out. i looked up at the sky and noticed two or three objects in the sky like stars. so i got my camera and took a video as i had seen the same thing a week or so earlier and wanted to get a good not shakey picture. i didnt have my camera stand the week earlier and i wanted to be ready to get a better picture, video if there was a next time. i saw them and i got the camera, the stand and took a good long video. no one i have shown it to has ever seen anything like it. i sent a picture to jim in tuson and he said fill out a form and send it to you guys so thats what im doing. its really scarey and i hope they dont bother any of us. i really didnt want to see this but wanted to see what the heck they were. i didnt know if it was a satallite, it wasnt. no idea what it is. it kind of looks like a star in the distance, then as i put the zoom of the camera it looks round and then it gets close enough that you can seen it is six sided, pulsates, glowing, looks beige\tan in color. the thing, both of them one in the real distance i cant get focused as well as the one closer. and they both move, like drift up down to the side. strange. i dont want to look anymore but my curiosity is getting the best of me. i took the video they went to bed i was really tired, so i dont know how long the objects were in the sky.
